H0.text: Launched from the desert steppes of Kazakhstan, Vostok 1 was launched on April 12, 1961, carrying which man, the first in outer space. Alexei Leonov

H1.text: Launched from the desert steppes of Kazakhstan, Vostok 1 was launched on April 12, 1961, carrying which man, the first in outer space. Sergei Korolev

H2.text: Launched from the desert steppes of Kazakhstan, Vostok 1 was launched on April 12, 1961, carrying which man, the first in outer space. Pavel Belyayev

H3.text: Launched from the desert steppes of Kazakhstan, Vostok 1 was launched on April 12, 1961, carrying which man, the first in outer space. Gagarin

A4.text: Yuri Alekseyevich Gagarin (9 March 1934 â€“ 27 March 1968) was a Soviet pilot and cosmonaut who, aboard the first successful crewed spaceflight, became the first person to journey into outer space.

A5.text: Gagarin became the first human to orbit the Earth.
